name: Bacon Man: An Adventure
description: Bacon Man: An Adventure is an action platformer about food and the ferocious fight for freedom. Fight, shoot or evade your way through tougher-than-nails levels as one of four unique characters, each with their own play style.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: 2.0+ GHz multi-core processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 9 GB available space Additional Notes: Plays best with a controller.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: 2.0+ GHz multi-core processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 670 GTX or AMD Radeon 7950 HD series card or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 9 GB available space Additional Notes: Plays best with a controller.
